AnalyzeDocument.name: AnalyzeDocument
AnalyzeDocument.description: Grants permission to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image provided as input

AnalyzeExpense.name: AnalyzeExpense
AnalyzeExpense.description: Grants permission to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image provided as input

AnalyzeID.name: AnalyzeID
AnalyzeID.description: Grants permission to detect relevant information from identity documents provided as input

CreateAdapter.name: CreateAdapter
CreateAdapter.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Textract adapter

CreateAdapterVersion.name: CreateAdapterVersion
CreateAdapterVersion.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Textract adapter version

DeleteAdapter.name: DeleteAdapter
DeleteAdapter.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Textract adapter

DeleteAdapterVersion.name: DeleteAdapterVersion
DeleteAdapterVersion.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Textract adapter version

DetectDocumentText.name: DetectDocumentText
DetectDocumentText.description: Grants permission to detect text in document images

GetAdapter.name: GetAdapter
GetAdapter.description: Grants permission to get an Amazon Textract adapter

GetAdapterVersion.name: GetAdapterVersion
GetAdapterVersion.description: Grants permission to get an Amazon Textract adapter version

GetDocumentAnalysis.name: GetDocumentAnalysis
GetDocumentAnalysis.description: Grants permission to return information about a document analysis job

GetDocumentTextDetection.name: GetDocumentTextDetection
GetDocumentTextDetection.description: Grants permission to return information about a document text detection job

GetExpenseAnalysis.name: GetExpenseAnalysis
GetExpenseAnalysis.description: Grants permission to return information about an expense analysis job

GetLendingAnalysis.name: GetLendingAnalysis
GetLendingAnalysis.description: Grants permission to retrieve page-level information regarding a lending analysis job

GetLendingAnalysisSummary.name: GetLendingAnalysisSummary
GetLendingAnalysisSummary.description: Grants permission to retrieve summarized information regarding a lending analysis job

ListAdapterVersions.name: ListAdapterVersions
ListAdapterVersions.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Textract adapter versions

ListAdapters.name: ListAdapters
ListAdapters.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Textract adapters

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags associated with a resource

StartDocumentAnalysis.name: StartDocumentAnalysis
StartDocumentAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image or pdf provided as input

StartDocumentTextDetection.name: StartDocumentTextDetection
StartDocumentTextDetection.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect text in document images or pdfs

StartExpenseAnalysis.name: StartExpenseAnalysis
StartExpenseAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect instances of invoices or receipts within an image or pdf provided as input

StartLendingAnalysis.name: StartLendingAnalysis
StartLendingAnalysis.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job for detection of entities in a lending document, takes a provided image or PDF as input

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

UpdateAdapter.name: UpdateAdapter
UpdateAdapter.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Textract adapter
